name: VAR
description: Stores the result of an expression as a named variable.

name: RETURN
description: Outputs the result of a variable block.

name: EVALUATE
description: Executes a DAX query and returns a table.

name: DEFINE
description: Introduces definitions that apply to EVALUATE statements.

name: MEASURE
description: Defines a measure within a query scope (inside DEFINE).

name: COLUMN
description: Defines a calculated column within a query scope (inside DEFINE).

name: TABLE
description: Defines a calculated table within a query scope (inside DEFINE).

name: ORDER BY
description: Sorts the results of an EVALUATE statement.

name: START AT
description: Specifies starting values for ORDER BY.

name: PARTITION BY
description: Divides the table into partitions for window functions.

name: MATCHBY
description: Defines matching columns for window functions.

name: ASC
description: Specifies ascending sort order.

name: DESC
description: Specifies descending sort order.

name: IN
description: Compares a value against a list or column.

name: STRING
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: INTEGER
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: DOUBLE
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: DATETIME
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: CURRENCY
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: BOOLEAN
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.
